Tucson nods in agreement as he keeps an arm around Talon's shoulder.  He co=
uld not deny that he desired Talon's company most of all and gives her the =
same gaze he had given her before when he proposed to her.  But in his new =
form it was much more easy to see his body language because of his more tec=
hno organic composure.  

" You're right.  After all, they are a family, an=
d they need time with each other.  Perhaps one day we will have a family ou=
rselves. "

He then sighs and looks to where the Autobots lie in stasis.  I=
t had been a while since he last paid respects to Optimus Prime and he now =
escorts Talon to where he rests.

" Also, I haven't paid my respects to Opt=
imus since everything happened. I try to do that every so often, just one o=
f my personal codes of honoring the leaders of the past, present, and the f=
uture."

He approaches the body of Optimus Prime and kneels beside him, wit=
h an arm around Talon's shoulder.

" I know I haven't been visiting you lat=
ely, and I apologize, Optimus Prime. Things have changed drastically, and e=
vents continue to escalate even further.  Now there's a rip in the time spa=
ce continuum and truthfully, I'm at a loss as to how to rectify that.  But =
I suppose as time goes on, I will learn how to set things as they should be=
.  If you were here, you would know what to do, as you have in so many othe=
r situations.  I really could use your help now, Sir.  Unicron's influence =
is returning and has poisoned this planet.  Now with that happening and the=
 presence of the Decepticons and Predacons, our own forces, Autobot and Max=
imal are drastically out numbered.  Even though I have found Big Convoy and=
 his group, still, there are far too many of them and not enough of us to k=
eep them at bay. "

He smiles to Talon and then looks to Optimus.

" Oh yes=
, one more thing, if you were here with us now, I would be greatly honored =
if you were to give Talon and me your blessing as a joined companionship of=
 all eternity.  Anyway, I know you wish to rest in silence, and now I will =
respect that.  Rest in peace Optimus Prime."

He kneels and bows his head i=
n silent prayer.

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using tradi=
tional and digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great =
for any occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem! =
 Email me at this address and we will talk.

> > > > > > Tucson sighs. The problem wasn't just isolated to =
the Earth, it had also escalated outside the planet's atmosphere. At one ti=

lp of many hands, not just his own. He looks thoughtfully to everyone, not =
knowing how to convey his thoughts at first, but then he turns to the monit=
or and looks up to that.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > " Thank you Legacy, it do=
es make some sense of how large this problem has become. I admit, there are=
 more of them, then there are of us. But that doesn't mean we give up our p=
light to protect this planet from future harm. "
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > N=
ightshift hobbles over to Tucson.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > " I wish there w=
as some way ta find out if there were more Autobots out there. We got a gre=
at team here but, we need more help. And we can't wake up the team we have =
here because that'll really mess things up. "
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Ratt=
rap nods.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > " Hey he's got a point, Do you guys know=
 if there's more Autobots out there that ya don't know about? And is there =
a way ta make contact? "
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Straightshot waddles up t=
o Tucson.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > " There's only one way ta find out. I us=
ed ta be a communications operator on Iacon before we came to Earth. I coul=
d start putting a call out on Autobot frequency and see if anyone picks up.=
"

> > > > > > Tucson smiles and nods.
> > > > > >

 " It's a long shot but, a very good idea. Yes, please do that. Lord Elder =
if you could, allow Straightshot access to Teletran One, and see if she can=
 acquire an Autobot frequency. Legacy, I would like you to monitor that rip=
 in the time space continuum and see if you can get an idea as to who may h=
ave caused it. Remember, the more intel we have the better off we are."

They know Nightshift is a Maximal but they have not met us yet. Leo, Big Co=
nvoy, we will need you to survey the ground areas where we can not see them=

> > > > > > > > you could, please try to cont=
act them and see if they can survey the land for us. The

> >

sion it would
> > > > > > > seem. "Yes another of my kind has arrived and s=
he has been programmed
> > > > > > > to be a temporal guardian, but her spa=
rk was damaged in translating us
> > > > > > > to this time frame. She poss=
esses the same knowledge as I, but what
> > > > > > > she will do with that=
 knowledge I cannot know."
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > There was a pause f=
rom LEGACY and then he spoke, "I believe she is
> > > > > > > among the Pre=
dacons."

 > Nightight moved silently near Rodimus

US gave NIGHTLIGHT a gentle squeeze as she moved next to him.
> > > > > > >=
 "Then we need to go figure out if this is true and the extent of the
> > >=

> > > > > > >

ere was a contemplative light from LEGACY's optic, "I can tell you
> > > > =

> =

o was also standing amidst the group. "We
> > > > > > > don't have time for=

g hand on POLAR CLAW as LEGACY apparently
> > > > > > > ignored the outburs=
t.

or quite some time, one that has most
